data.name: Monsters: The Hunter of Darkness
data.detailed_description:
In a world twisted by greed, ambitions and vengeance, where men turned into vicious monsters.
You must face various challenges during your mission in the unsettling Duchy of Siebenbürgen.

• Combat is fast and easy to pick up, but still challenging to master
• Various types of enemy and Boss fight
• Story driven NPCs will join and fight along side with you
• Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, craft new equipment and items
• Traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths, puzzles and secrets abound
• Recommand use gamepad
• Perfect for Handheld PC and Steam Deck

Through out this journey, you will meet precious friends as well as deadly foes.
Can you seek out the truth at the end?

Remember, whatevery you do, they are watching...
data.about_the_game:
In a world twisted by greed, ambitions and vengeance, where men turned into vicious monsters.
You must face various challenges during your mission in the unsettling Duchy of Siebenbürgen.

Through out this journey, you will meet precious friends as well as deadly foes.
Can you seek out the truth at the end?

Remember, whatevery you do, they are watching...
data.short_description: Monsters is a 2D Action RPG game. It set in a fictional world where everything is shrouded by a darkness power...Fight with your allys and defeat the real monsters behind it all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th Gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Compatiable with Steam Deck
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 & Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 1165G7 or equivalent AMD CPU/APU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Compatiable with Steam Deck

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th Gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 1165G7 or equivalent AMD CPU/APU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
